name: RAGE (itch) (Hawkinberry)
description:
RAGE! A game where your goal is to vent your frustrations on the small hamlet beneath your mountain. Beware the village's defenses!

 ~~ CONTROLS ~~

Use the arrow keys to move around, and make sure to keep your RAGE charged by crushing tiny villagers.

I had a lot of fun making this! It was my first game jam, and I learned so much. I didn't get all the features in that I wanted to, but I would like to continue to add to it. To give you an idea, imagine an opening animation, difficulty settings, endless mode, and even a jump mechanic! There are two end conditions, but I worked far longer than I should have to balance the game so that it was not too easy and not too challenging, and the end result is slightly too hard!!

Thank you for playing!

- Hawkin
